title: Another geometric font hard to id
content:
Hi everyone  
here is a font I had to redraw with illo but have to do window vinyl lettering for this client but I have trouble in "iding" this baby.

this not bauhaus nor P22 bayer universal…

Thanks so much for your help in advance

jérôme, Lyons-france

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [LOGO OK TEXTE.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014203125/http:/typophile.com/files/LOGO%20OK%20TEXTE_3.jpg) | 29.99 KB |
author: jezza

comments.content: It's very, very hard, without even a sample... :-)
sorry trying hard to attach the image
Clearly manipulated and not particularly well. Hopefully you can use one of the better ones instead.

Dezcom  
what do you suggest as better substitute fonts?

thanks in advance

jérôme

I would start from Bauhaus Bold.  
Other options here:  
 [http://www.bowfinprintworks.com/BauhausFaces.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014203125/http:/www.bowfinprintworks.com/BauhausFaces.html "http://www.bowfinprintworks.com/BauhausFaces.html")
